item.description:
• We have approximately 7-9 but can accomodate more. Buy in is only $10 with  no re-buys as it is a week night. This is a friendly, game of Texas Hold'em with people who have played before and know the basics.   Repeats every 2nd & 4th Wed of each month.

    Also will be collecting $1 for our new organizer Mitch.

    Feel free to bring the beverage &/or munchies of your choice plus we will serve simple munchies.

    Hope you can make it.

    Darlene & Dave
item.how_to_find_us: Top of Rt 69 heading towards Wolcott near Cedar Lake in Bristol.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Texas Hold'em at the Rubino's 2nd & 4th Wed of the month.
